citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
One of the two brown rabbits that are housed together on the left side of the barn has a severe head tilt to the left.
This animal has not been seen by the attending veterinarian. The rabbit needs to be seen by the veterinarian.
Correct by: 03-05-16.

The support wooden board for the wire mesh fencing in the front paddock for the goats has been split apart from the
goats head-butting it. This board needs to be replaced with something stronger to withstand the goats pushing and
head-butting on it. The facility must be constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the
animals involved.
Correct by: 03-30-16.
An exit briefing was conducted with the facility representative.

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)
ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
One of the two brown rabbits that are housed together on the left side of the barn has a severe head tilt to the left. 
This animal has not been seen by the attending veterinarian.  The rabbit needs to be seen by the veterinarian.  
Correct by:  03-05-16.
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
The support wooden board for the wire mesh fencing in the front paddock for the goats has been split apart from the
goats head-butting it.  This board needs to be replaced with something stronger to withstand the goats pushing and
head-butting on it.   The facility must be constructed of such material and of such strength as appropriate for the
animals involved.  
Correct by:  03-30-16.
An exit briefing was conducted with the facility representative.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
